## üöÄ Desktop Installation

Follow these steps to install DOT APP on your computer and start collaborating visually:

### üñ•Ô∏è Step 1: Download the installer

Download the version that corresponds to your operating system:

   <template>
     <div class="flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-4 mt-4">
       <a href="https://cdn.set.digitalharbor.us/installers/dot/uat/0.2.1/dot-0.2.1-windows.exe" class="btn btn-primary"> üëâ Windows </a>
     </div>
   </template>

### ‚öôÔ∏è Step 2: Run the installation

* Open the downloaded file.

* Follow the on-screen instructions.

* Wait until the installation completes successfully.

### üîê Step 3: Initial registration or sign in

* Open DOT APP.

* Complete the initial registration, or simply sign in if you already have an account.

#### üí° Tip

DOT APP will remember your credentials for future sessions.
